data.Napina: Machinery out of order, delay will be great
data.Nardinus: Many happy returns of the day
data.Negantia: Marriage will not take place; particulars by letter
data.Negotium: Medicine not arrived, send at once
data.Nitraria: Can you meet me as suggested
data.Nitrum: Can you meet me this evening
data.Nivatus: Cannot meet you as arranged, will explain later
data.Nocivus: Cannot attend the meeting of the Board
data.Noctifer: Cannot attend the meeting of the Committee
data.Noctua: Consult the colonel and let me know result
data.Nodosus: Will you exchange with me for ---
data.Nomino: Can my leave be extended to ---
data.Nomus: Extension of leave cannot be sanctioned
data.Nonageni: Extension of leave cannot be sanctioned, you must return at once
data.Nonanus: Extension of leave required on legal affairs until ---
data.Nonassis: Extension of leave required on urgent family affairs until ---
data.Nondum: Extension of leave required on urgent private affairs until ---
data.Nonnemo: Extension of leave required, please sanction until ---
data.Noscito: Is my extension of leave sanctioned
data.Nosco: Furlough to all officers on leave has been cancelled, and they are ordered to rejoin their regiments by ---
data.Nossem: Furlough to all officers on leave has been cancelled, and they are ordered to rejoin at once ---
data.Noster: The prohibition of furlough to officers on leave has been cancelled ---
